text: @realDonaldTrump Mr President, the bitter truth is that you are in the White House and you are responsible for every Americans well being, Truth is that COVID-19 has taken over America and you have to stop the spread. The only way is to go for “COMPLETE LOCKDOWN ‘ for three months. Enforce Curfew
